relevant_findings.constitutional: Well appearing, in no acute distress
relevant_findings.cardiopulmonary: RRR, normal S1 and S2. No murmurs, rubs or gallops. Lungs are clear to auscultation bilaterally
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-distended, right-lower quadrant tenderness with rebound and voluntary guarding. Minimal tenderness over epigastrium
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm and well-perfused. No clubbing, cyanosis or edema. Well-healed incisional scar over right knee.
relevant_findings.neurologic: Alert and oriented x 3. No gross deficits
